column1: Notice how ever since people started rioting we haven’t heard anything about corona virus? Hmmmnmm very suspicious

Prevention!! Prevention!! Prevention!! The #COVID19 has now crossed into the borders of W/Africa, fear and panic will not do good to ourselves. Incumbent on all to practice personal hygiene and preventive measures to move swiftly to control this world pandemic outbreak.
